uh scene graph is our unified structure

burst.
So singraft has three main concepts. Uh
our first concept is the component. Um
the component is the data and logic for
your game. So think of like transform,
meshes, particles, sound. Those are all
components that we can add to our
entities. Entity is a container for your
components.
And then finally, prefabs are multiple
entities and their components grouped
together in a class.
So, let's take a look at how we build a

work together.
